title: Ticket #3551: Remove $(HOSTNAME) from default LOCK value?
description: Given that use a random number as well, does having $(HOSTNAME) in the condor_configure script's default value for LOCK make any sense? We've seen a case where using $(HOSTNAME) leaves the machine unable to start any jobs, because the starter thinks that $(HOSTNAME) is something other than the master does (see #3506) and therefore tries to use a LOCK directory that doesn't exist (or, potentially, that the procd isn't using).
